descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][font=vijaya] [color=DarkSalmon]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/Hein84-1145178992160965/]reach me on Facebook[/url][/color][line][/font][/size][/center]
The overdue revision of my first mod, "High Realistic Tundra Moss"

and yep, it's technically lichen;)

more important, it's finally compatible with EVERY rock texture.
As all my mods it uses a small parallax map to enhance it's lighting.

Due to the mesh editing a resolution of 1024 is absolutely sufficient for gaming, nevertheless I added an optional 2k texture for screenarchers.
256 I suggest those who are still using original sized textures.

[youtube]ZpAqHTdt834[/youtube]

Cause my other "High Realistic Tundra Moss" mods are obsolete now, I'll delete/hide them

Thanks to Brumbek for the great "[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]"
it's meshes are selectable in a compatibility patch



If you like this mod, try my other "Vivid Landscapes" series
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Vivid Landscapes - All in One
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?
(contains all mods below in a single BSA archive)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

the mods separately:

Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41198//?

Vivid Landscapes - Rocking Stones and Mountains Parallax
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38004//?

Vivid Landscapes - Dungeons and Ruins
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39874//?

Vivid Landscapes - Cliffs and Creeks
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38497//?

Vivid Landscapes - Imperial Forts
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43107/?

Vivid Landscapes - Birthsigns
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50324/?

Btw.
I added some plants and slugs, hope you like them;)
